Summary: I saw the same thing last night.
divs: sighting detailsi have witnessed the same orb that is report in ny about a green light coming down on 08\21\09...it couldn't be a meteor...it was huge and it had this strange color...i have to say i was a witnessed of another report filed a few months ago about another strange green light that crossed manhattan in a incredible speed..i have seen strange objects in ny's skies...people should look up more ...not only accidents are happening over the hudson river...something is happening and we are not aware of that...
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Union City
There were no other sightings in Union City on or around August 21st 2009
